title: pancApakEshvarENa
sahitya:
pancApakEshvarENa paripAlitOham sadA


anupallavi

  pancAnanEna trayambakEna praNava nAda svarUpENa


caraNam    panca bANApa ghana dahanEna prapanca shrSTi sthiti laya kAraNEna
 panca prANAdhAra bhUtEna panca cara janaka venkaTEsha hitEna
 panca bhUtAkArENa sarvENa panca bhUtAtmakEna rudrENa
 panca bhUtAtItEna bhavEna pancAkSara sadanEna shivEna
